calendarEvent.title: Wedding Nele & Luis
calendarEvent.location: Bildungsgut Schmochtitz Sankt Benno, Bautzen, Germany
calendarEvent.description: We are getting married! We are excited to celebrate with you!

byCarFromDresden.title: By car from Dresden
byCarFromDresden.description: Take A4 until exit Salzenforst, follow signage to Schmochtitz.

byCarFromBautzen.title: By car from Bautzen
byCarFromBautzen.description: Take S111 until Dreistern, turn right onto S106, follow signage to Schmochtitz.

byTrainFromDresden.title: By train from Dresden
byTrainFromDresden.description: Take RE1/RB60 from Dresden until Bautzen and take a taxi from Bautzen station to location (~10km).

parking.title: Parking
parking.description: Free parking is available, look for signage on site.

accommodation.descriptionSecondary: Otherwise, we recommend staying in Bautzen or Dresden.

dressCode.title: Dress code
dressCode.subtitle: What to wear
dressCode.intro:
The dress code for our wedding is semi-formal.
We kindly encourage you to wear bright colours for our special day.
dressCode.men: Suits or slacks with a colourful shirt and/or tie
dressCode.women: Cocktail dresses or dressy separates in a nice colour
dressCode.note: Please note: Our wedding ceremony will take place outdoors on grass, followed by an indoor reception.

gifts.title: Gifts
gifts.subtitle: Your presence is our greatest gift
gifts.description: If you still would like to give us a present, a contribution towards our travel funds would be highly appreciated!
